content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/">   <ShortName>Green Festival</ShortName>   <Description>Green Festival, America's Largest and Longest-Running Sustainability and Green Living Event.</Description>   <InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding>   <Image type="image/vnd.microsoft.icon" width="16" height="16">http://www.greenfestivals.org/templates/fontaine_j25/favicon.ico</Image>   <Url type="application/opensearchdescription+xml" rel="self" template="http://www.greenfestivals.org/search?format=opensearch&link_id=1430"/>   <Url type="text/html" template="http://www.greenfestivals.org/index.php?option=com_search&searchword={searchTerms}"/> </OpenSearchDescription>
